name: A Better You Wellness Center, LLC

narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: A Better You Wellness Center, LLC is a Community/Behavioral Health provider based in Phoenix, AZ. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $115.4M in Medicaid payments across 60K claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: This provider received $115.4M in taxpayer-funded Medicaid payments — enough to fund healthcare for approximately 14,419 Medicaid beneficiaries for a full year at average per-enrollee costs.
